Document status will be changed to “Cancelled” and document will not appear in the sales. Do you want to continue ?

ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans('Document status will be changed to “Cancelled” and document will not appear in the purchase. Do you want to continue ?')
MlsTrans('This transaction already Closed. Cannot edit this Transaction.')
MlsTrans('This transaction already Canceled. Cannot edit this Transaction.')
MlsTrans('This transaction is being approved. Cannot edit this transaction.')
MlsTrans('This transaction already Closed. Cannot cancel this Transaction.')

SQL_STMT_U.val: select COUNT(DocEntry),SUM(DocTotal) from OPRQ WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE (DocDate between ':1' and ':2') and (DocStatus = ':3' or ':3' is null or ':3' = '') and DocNum Like '%:5%' :4 :6

select DocEntry,DocNum, DocType, DocStatus, InvntSttus, DocCur, Transfered, ObjType, DocDate, DocDueDate, DocTotal, CANCELED, ReqName, U_IDU_Kode_PT, Comments, UserSign, CreateDate, CreateTS, UserSign2, UpdateDate, UpdateTS,WddStatus FROM OPRQ WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE (DocDate between ':1' and ':2') and (DocStatus = ':3' or ':3' is null or ':3' = '') and DocNum Like '%:5%' :4 :6 order by docentry desc
